div.p: JS Core Framework is a JavaScript library. It's purpose is to provide the right structure to make it easier to build large scalable modular JavaScript applications using MVP pattern. It provides wrappers for task driven tools, as well as sandbox environment where modules of the application are being spawn and controlled.
JS Core Framework addresses cross-cutting concerns not already addressed by JavaScript and also makes it easier to use common tasks. Also ...

ul.li: Its based on small independent modules
New modules can be implemented with a short turnaround
